compatibility.notes: NPL-1.0 allows for linking with other licenses but requires that modifications to NPL-1.0 licensed code remain under the same license. Care should be taken when combining with strong copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Comply with the terms of the license when modifying and distributing the software.

license.name: NPL-1.0
obligations: Must disclose source code when distributing modifications.
Must include a copy of the license with any distribution.
Must include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the Covered Code.
Must include a notice stating changes made to the original code.
